subtitles:
185469 188159 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
188209 191290 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

192160 194810 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
209032 211513 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

219993 222814 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

222904 226735 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

226865 232075 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

232165 235646 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

244216 247387 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249518 253818 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
253908 255478 We'll get you out of here.

255558 260260 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277611 279742 Get it off! Get it off!

283352 286562 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295224 298435 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004010 1006880 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015051 1017621 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046275 1048495 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078499 1083240 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085411 1090631 The man goes to leave and the barman says
\x220i! You can't leave that lying there.\x22
1090721 1094762 He says \x22No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe\x22.
1105373 1108284 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1115065 1118596 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123156 1129596 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1129676 1133417 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159591 1165852 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165942 1170112 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1170982 1173722 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1173802 1178543 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1182414 1185245 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1187855 1190375 There was something in the blood.

1191856 1196806 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203947 1206636 And that's when the exodus started.

1210858 1214509 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1216899 1219809 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1222770 1225729 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1228380 1232420 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232550 1236810 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1238291 1241382 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241992 1246163 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1264555 1268555 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1268645 1271215 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285998 1290428 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292909 1296999 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1301169 1304780 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1319432 1322613 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1486985 1490936 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1497376 1501898 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1504507 1509849 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1510508 1512848 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512938 1516289 even though cash was completely useless.
1517809 1520940 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1526510 1528811 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530991 1533332 I remember the ground was soft.

1535292 1539682 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1539772 1543722 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1543812 1547774 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1547854 1551203 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1552814 1555904 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555994 1558334 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1560645 1565596 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1565686 1569556 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1583688 1588818 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591519 1594340 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1594430 1597781 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1700444 1702744 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1711615 1713706 I'll start working on them, then.

1747150 1750100 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1750190 1752411 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1755672 1758582 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1796457 1798547 Do you have any clothes here?

1801628 1805288 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1805368 1809029 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837812 1840813 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1840893 1844813 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844893 1850294 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1850374 1854765 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854855 1859986 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1860076 1865506 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865596 1869817 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869897 1874337 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1877037 1879598 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1938345 1941436 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1941516 1944607 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1962569 1964609 Now I do need a break.

1984392 1989703 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990913 1995183 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1997444 1999704 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999784 2004875 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010616 2013616 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2091016 2094017 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2094107 2096367 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129761 2132852 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2148114 2150415 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150505 2153545 Why don't you all sit down and...
2153635 2156595 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2156675 2159156 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2170158 2173158 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2173248 2176118 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198901 2201992 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2230776 2236386 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2238037 2240297 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246868 2249478 Have to empty it each morning.

2249558 2253219 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2255088 2258219 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2271561 2273952 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2310657 2314357 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2315487 2318308 Probably need us more than we need them.

2329620 2334270 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2334400 2338140 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342621 2346141 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2362184 2365444 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2367314 2371314 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2403539 2405579 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2405709 2409799 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409889 2413110 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429583 2433843 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2433933 2437674 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2453716 2456847 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2465807 2469548 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2469638 2474198 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2474288 2477289 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2477379 2481899 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2481979 2484160 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2487641 2492201 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495812 2499722 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.

2499812 2502203 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2502293 2505202 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508943 2513724 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519645 2525726 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525816 2528946 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2529036 2531556 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2531646 2535596 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537467 2541777 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2541857 2545338 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2545428 2549729 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2549819 2552650 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552730 2556820 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2561300 2566990 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570471 2575732 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576472 2578562 So we have to try and get there.

2592694 2596435 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2624999 2627999 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2628089 2633350 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650962 2653443 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2654313 2657703 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2657793 2662184 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2662274 2665184 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2700838 2703229 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2703319 2706670 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2709191 2711321 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725933 2729453 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2761457 2765757 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765847 2769108 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2775550 2780680 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2791591 2794502 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807894 2810334 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886824 2890385 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2890515 2892344 I think you can eat that raw.

2899996 2904517 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2909218 2912828 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2920959 2924179 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2979097 2982137 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3034364 3037055 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3135158 3137938 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213908 3216909 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217739 3220520 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3281828 3285529 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3285619 3289789 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3290829 3294659 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3299179 3302440 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3305660 3307921 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319363 3323884 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325273 3328704 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3331404 3335015 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3338625 3341145 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358928 3362888 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3391243 3393893 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3410716 3414586 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3414676 3418977 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421676 3424247 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3424327 3428027 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3428157 3430378 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442850 3445550 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446640 3450641 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3527561 3530341 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585658 3589129 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3589219 3594219 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3618793 3623314 Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3630795 3633796 The answer to Infection is here.
3670140 3673491 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3675361 3677671 No fire crews to put it out.

3808638 3812639 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3812729 3815859 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822691 3827511 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943917 3946837 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946917 3949398 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4012667 4015327 Three survivors. One male, two female.
4015407 4018757 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083546 4088416 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088506 4090897 So you can all have a shower.
4091027 4094338 You look like you need one. Please.

4114290 4119512 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4128292 4131473 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4143775 4147345 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4151206 4156166 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156296 4160206 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161476 4163907 I want her to be OK.
4165477 4167647 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167737 4170518 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210653 4214174 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214264 4220355 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222784 4226956 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231486 4235957 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236357 4239268 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239358 4242488 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4242568 4245658 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4255699 4261570 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265571 4269832 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269922 4274572 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277833 4282743 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282873 4285264 The belly of the house. The heart.

4285354 4290614 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292874 4295004 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4295094 4298265 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4298355 4302396 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4304966 4307967 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4332360 4337450 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4345101 4349142 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4371845 4375275 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386887 4392278 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4432023 4434504 You'll have to wait and see
4436894 4439464 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4455896 4459247 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4466858 4469289 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4469379 4472599 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4472689 4475819 but this omelette will do just as well.

4491382 4495293 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4495383 4498772 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505773 4508553 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4509383 4514864 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514954 4519475 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519555 4522826 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4522906 4525737 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525827 4529867 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529957 4534257 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4534387 4537478 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4539558 4543698 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4544478 4546908 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547908 4550219 that is a return to normality.

4554220 4557221 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4557301 4560561 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4563431 4568652 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4571432 4575563 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4578353 4582913 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4583003 4588435 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4588525 4592175 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4600486 4603437 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606397 4609657 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4610567 4613657 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617789 4619839 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671626 4675236 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691929 4694188 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4716852 4722503 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4722583 4724762 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726583 4731853 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733504 4735674 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741895 4746376 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4754117 4757157 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4757247 4760678 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4771159 4773859 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776770 4779331 The rest of you, go with him.

4801733 4805944 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4806034 4807554 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807644 4812815 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4820076 4823206 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834867 4839648 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4860601 4864392 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865561 4870302 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870392 4873263 What could I say to him?

4873343 4878524 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879474 4883305 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4883395 4889525 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4907088 4908878 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908959 4911008 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4917179 4919139 We get in the car and we go!

4920480 4925050 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4925140 4928401 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4928480 4931180 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4945093 4947444 I want to give you a chance.
4951274 4953574 But I can't let them go.

4981617 4984408 Smithers says
\x22Women and semen don't mix.\x22

4984488 4987408 And Mr Burns says
\x22We all know what you think, Smithers.\x22

4987488 4990409 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4990489 4994099 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4994189 4998620 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998710 5001971 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5002061 5007761 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008842 5012892 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5014232 5017363 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018412 5020713 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020803 5025103 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5025193 5027894 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027974 5031975 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5036286 5039846 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5048627 5052977 \x22There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people.\x22 He's insane!

5099554 5102634 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103724 5108855 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5108945 5112856 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116726 5118776 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143780 5147210 Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
5147300 5149780 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149860 5152910 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5155731 5158782 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158862 5160782 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160862 5164342 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173644 5177604 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5177694 5181865 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5183124 5185955 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188435 5191646 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201438 5203307 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218789 5222260 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5261315 5265266 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265356 5268926 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5269006 5271577 which she certainly has no use for.
5272576 5274397 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274487 5278188 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291709 5294490 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294580 5297930 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316663 5320804 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322664 5326404 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326494 5330625 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354409 5357278 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380372 5384333 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5384413 5386543 Are you trying to kill me?
5388983 5391543 I'm making you not care. OK?
5403505 5406154 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5412026 5414596 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644627 5647108 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5648147 5652108 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654848 5657499 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670671 5673152 I think they're having an effect.

5688713 5691584 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5692323 5695414 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5695504 5697504 Is that the way it works?

5701065 5705155 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5724068 5727198 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5727288 5730119 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5752202 5757722 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765684 5769074 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791517 5794468 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5821040 5824781 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003496 6007896 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071245 6076075 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6076165 6080596 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080686 6083037 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147386 6149866 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6164127 6167648 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173438 6175919 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6176049 6179350 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187871 6191441 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6191521 6193612 But I thought he was biting you.
6193702 6196391 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198702 6200833 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6299145 6301536 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6395248 6397949 You looked all right in this, you know.

6419552 6422903 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6478390 6481301 Do you think he saw us this time?
